response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is worth more than just its monetary value; it represents a significant milestone and personal achievement. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, which I believe is a fair and generous offer considering its true worth. I trust that you will appreciate its significance and find it worthy of the investment. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this valuable item with someone who will cherish it as much as I have.", "product_price": 950000}
